question: What is the primary objective of DICGC?
option1: protect the interest of small depositors
option3: protect the large corporate from going bankrupt
answer: protect the interest of small depositors
explanation: RBI has set up the Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation (DICGC) to protect the interest of small depositors, in case of bank failure. The DICGC provides insurance cover to all eligible bank depositors up to Rs.1 lakh per depositor per bank.
